summary: An ordinance relating to certain delinquent local improvement and condemnation district bonds and to certain unpaid old revolving fund warrants issued for the purchase of certain of such bonds; creating a special revolving fund pursuant to Chapter 244, Laws of Washington, 1943, for purchase of any such bonds and warrants upon tender at not more than 10% of the face value of the principal thereof, and repealing Ordinance No. 31884 as amended by Ordinances Nos. 36849, 62217 and 65983.
